# Taquito Documentation

> Official documentation for Taquito, a TypeScript library for building DApps on the Tezos blockchain.

This file lists all documentation pages available at https://taquito.io. Use this to understand the documentation structure and find relevant pages.

## URL Structure

Documentation pages follow this pattern:
- `/docs/{version}/{page}` - Versioned documentation
- Example: `/docs/next/quick_start` or `/docs/next/making_transfers`

The `next` version contains the latest unreleased documentation.

## Documentation Pages

### Getting Started
- `quick_start` - Quick Start
- `tutorial` - Building Your First dApp
- `operation_flow` - Operation Flow
- `rpc_nodes` - RPC nodes
- `web3js_taquito` - web3js vs Taquito
- `fallback_rpc` - Fallback RPC URLs
- `rpc_analytics_headers` - RPC Analytics Headers

### Taquito Providers
- `prepare` - Prepare Provider
- `estimate` - Estimate Provider

### Operations
- `making_transfers` - Transfers (Transaction)
- `originate` - Originating (Deploying) Contracts
- `consensus_key` - Consensus Keys
- `global_constant` - Global constants
- `increase_paid_storage` - Increase Paid Storage
- `set_delegate` - Delegation
- `smart_rollups` - Smart Rollups
- `proposal_and_ballot` - Proposal & Ballot
- `failing_noop` - Failing Noop
- `staking` - Staking and Adaptive Issuance

### Smart Contracts
- `smartcontracts` - Smart contract interaction
- `contract_call_parameters` - Contract call parameters
- `fa2_parameters` - FA2 Parameters
- `manager_lambda` - MANAGER_LAMBDA
- `multisig_doc` - Multisig contract interactions

### Wallets
- `walletconnect` - WalletConnect (BETA)
- `wallets` - Wallets
- `transaction_limits` - Transaction limits

### Michelson
- `maps_bigmaps` - Maps and BigMaps
- `michelsonmap` - MichelsonMap class
- `tickets` - Tickets

### Views
- `lambda_view` - Lambda View
- `on_chain_views` - On-chain views

### Contract and Token Metadata
- `tzip12` - TZIP-12 Token Metadata
- `metadata-tzip16` - TZIP-16 Contract Metadata and Views

### Signers
- `signing` - Signing data
- `inmemory_signer` - In Memory Signer
- `ledger_signer` - Ledger Signer

### Packages
- `rpc_package` - RPC
- `michelson_encoder` - Michelson Encoder
- `michel_codec` - Michel Codec
- `contracts-library` - Contracts Library
- `timelock` - Timelock (BETA)
- `taquito_utils` - Taquito Utils
- **Sapling**
  - `sapling` - Sapling Toolkit
  - `sapling_in_memory_spending_key` - InMemorySpendingKey
  - `sapling_in_memory_viewing_key` - InMemoryViewingKey

### Advanced Scenarios
- `ophash_before_injecting` - Getting the Operation Hash without Injecting
- `drain_account` - Drain an account
- `complex_parameters` - Working with contracts having complex storage/parameters
- `confirmation_event_stream` - Confirmation Event Stream
- `events` - Contract Events
- `liquidity_baking` - Liquidity Baking interactions
- `storage_annotations` - Storage with/without annotations
- `tezos_domains` - Tezos Domains

### Modules customization
- `forger` - Forger
- `rpc-cache` - RPC caching
- `cancel_http_requests` - Cancel HTTP requests

### Running integration tests
- `ledger_integration_test` - Ledger tests
- `rpc_nodes_integration_test` - RPC tests

### Dapp Development
- `package_bundle` - Client-Side Environments
- `dapp_template` - Dapp Templates
- `dapp_prelaunch` - Dapp pre-launch checklist

### Taquito Public API
- `wallet_API` - Wallet API
- `batch-api` - Batch API

### Misc
- `tutorial_links` - Tutorial Links
- `contract-test-collection` - Smart contract collection
- `validators` - Validation functions
- `ballot` - Ballot Operation

### Other
- `failwith_errors` - Catching error messages
- `testing_strategies` - Taquito Testing Strategies
- `tzip16-sequence-diagram` - TZIP-16 Sequence diagrams

## API Reference

TypeDoc-generated API documentation is available at `/typedoc`.

## Resources

- GitHub: https://github.com/ecadlabs/taquito
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@taquito/taquito
